entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Process.ExitCode` throws `InvalidOperationException` #95831
  • Attempt to use of dynamically creates type in the attribute leads to exception #95829
  • [R2R] Drop inlining observations when inlining is not performed #95815
    9.0.0

Closed

  • DriveInfo.GetDrives() - Linux #95720
    Future
  • Stock Blazor Wasm template throws exception on some Chrome Android devices when AOT enabled #93980
    8.0.x
  • Interop tests crash on Mono #95792
  • FileSystemWatcher Not working when dotnet8 publish with native aot #95811

PullRequests

Created

  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add Configurable Shutdown Delay to ConsoleLifetime #95828
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [Mono][full-aot] Fix runtime invoke with delegate parameter #95824
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Merge more stores/loads #95823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] CI: Surface failures for MT job when runtime has changes #95817
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Move to using dotnet test instead of xunit directly #95812
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Merged

  • JIT: Reuse (new) loop-finding DFS tree in SSA #95809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix location of fgFindJumpTargets comment #95774
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove outdated TODO in JsonWriterHelper.Escaping.cs #95806
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Reenable disabled nativeaot warnings and fix the issues #95698
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add flowgraph dumping for new loops #95748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Forgot to call emitOutput_Instr on SVE_GD_2A #95814
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: more CSE refactoring #95796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use python venv for SPMI collection / jit rolling build #95714
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable IEnumerator test on Mono #95804
    disabled-test, area-Interop-mono

Updated

  • Respect ResponseHeaderEncodingSelector for the Location header #95810
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NativeAOT] Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make the intermediate output path OS-specific for CoreCLR #95797
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #95807
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #94388
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
